text: Device could mean: * A machine or part of one * A tool or part of one * An information appliance, such as a cell phone * Device implying computer hardware * A peripheral device attached to a computer * A display device (or graphics device), for visual or tactile presentation of images and/or text * An electronic component * A device file, in computing * Device No.1 (Flint album), an album by Flint * Heraldic device, part of a coat of arms * An attachment to a medal's ribbon denoting special service, participation in a battle, or additional awards. Examples include a service star and the oak leaf cluster. Devise could mean: * To invent * A disposition of real property in a will, like a bequest
title: Device
